Gotron

Gotron receives the transmission and heads out of the ship. He sees 
Reptillica talking with a bot, and with close detail he sees that it 
was Starscream, the bot that he had almost died with back at the Pred 
cave. No time to say hi. Gotron turned on his Jet pack and locked on 
to Dark One's position.
______________________________________________________________________
Tamron and Savage

Striker's missle deflects the microchip, making land on a small 
iguana. It sinks into the skin, and becomes Tamron's slave. 
Unfortunatly it didn't last very long.

"Stupid lizard..." Tamron stomps on it. He looks toward Sacage and 
Striker.

"Savage!! Let out all your anger on him! Kill him!"

Savage reached a new level of anger. He repeadidly swung his spiked 
tail and striker, hoping to pierce his body. Tamron turned back to 
the other bots. 6 of them. But if he could bring one to his side.... 
His thought was cut short as fire power hit his body, causing him to 
stumble. He had a grenade launcher in one hand and the Tamer in the 
other. He fired two greandes above all their heads and at The Ark, 
which caused a piece of the hull to collapse.

"I have a proposition! What I would personally like to do is just 
kill all of you and destroy The Ark. I don't care about time. Even if 
I didn't exist, it would be like me killing billions at once. But I 
will leave, on one condition. I will withdraw Savage, leave The Ark 
alone and return to my base without killing any of ou, but.....One of 
you must willfully take my micro-chip. Either that or have time 
destroyed."
